IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviDCPwr Specific Instrument Driver

Class Specification version:	3.00
IVI Generation:                 IVI-2014

Group Capabilities Supported:
Base            		= Supported
Measurement 			= Supported
Trigger     			= Supported
SoftwareTrigger 		= Supported



Optional Features:
-----------------
Interchangeability Checking      = True
State Caching                    = True
Coercion Recording               = True


Driver Identification:
---------------------
Driver Revision:                          3.2.1
Driver Vendor:                            National Instruments
Prefix:                                   hpe364xa
Description:                              DC Power Supplies



Driver Release Information:
--------------------------
Original Release Date:                    06/21/2000
Update Release Date:                      04/27/2015



Hardware Information:
--------------------
Instrument Manufacturer:                  Keysight Technologies; Agilent Technologies
Supported Instrument Models:              E3640A, E3641A, E3642A, E3643A, E3644A, E3645A, E3646A, E3647A, E3648A, E3649A
Supported Bus Interfaces:                 GPIB, Serial



32-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows XP, Windows Vista 32, Windows Vista 64, Windows 7 32, Windows 7 64
					  Windows 8 32, Windows 8 64
Unsupported Operating Systems:            Windows 2000
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1 or later, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available


64-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows Vista 64, Windows 7 64, Windows 8 64
Unsupported Operating Systems:            N/A
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1 or later, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available


Unit Testing
--------------------
Test Setup 1:

Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):          E3649A,1.7-5.0-1.0
Bus Interface:                                 GPIB
Operating System (Service Pack):               Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:                64-bit/32-bit
VISA Vendor and Version:                       NI-VISA 14.0
IVI Shared Components Version:                 2.30.49156



Driver Installation Testing:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):               Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                                    64-bit


Driver Buildability:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):               Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                                    64-bit


Driver Test Failures:
--------------------
Known Issues:                                  None


Note:
National Instruments has evaluated and/or tested this driver to verify that it meets all applicable requirements of the IVI specifications
at the time this compliance document was submitted to the IVI Foundation and agrees to abide by the dispute arbitration provisions
in Section 7 of IVI-1.2: Operating Procedures, if the IVI Foundation finds this driver to be non-conformant.
